title: Divider Page, "Font shop "D"", late 20th century
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Recto: On a bright pink background, there is a white square in the upper half with the word box, centered and imprinted in quotation marks, directly underneath the square. In the bottom half, instructions for the reader are imprinted in upper and lower case black type on nineteen lines. From the top down, for approximately three inches by one-half inch, the right edge is extended and imprinted with a capital D in white. On the left side, close to the edge, there are four holes punched at intervals.
Verso:  On a black background in the lower third, to the right of center, a capital letter D is encircled . Five lines of type appear below: on lines one and two, in smaller capitals, are the two designers' names, separated by commas and on line five, the country location; in upper and lower case, the firm name is on line three and  the city on line four.

tombstone.epitaph:
Divider Page, "Font shop "D"", late 20th century.
late 20th century. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-297.
